title: settings
overview:
The most straightforward way to customize the Paneled Outlier Explorer is by using a configuration object whose properties describe the behavior and appearance of the chart. Since the Paneled Outlier Explorer is a Webcharts `chart` object, many default Webcharts settings are set in the [defaultSettings.js file](https://github.com/RhoInc/paneled-outlier-explorer/blob/master/src/defaultSettings.js) as [described below](#webcharts-specific-settings). Refer to the [Webcharts documentation](https://github.com/RhoInc/Webcharts/wiki/Chart-Configuration) for more details on these settings.
In addition to the standard Webcharts settings several custom settings not available in the base Webcharts library have been added to the Paneled Outlier Explorer to facilitate data mapping and other custom functionality. These custom settings are described in detail below. All defaults can be overwritten by users.

time_cols.title: Time
time_cols.description: an array of each time variable and associated metadata

lln_col.title: Lower Limit of Normal
lln_col.description: lower limit of normal variable name

uln_col.title: Upper Limit of Normal
uln_col.description: upper limit of normal variable name

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: an array of each filter variable and associated metadata

multiples_sizing.title: Dimensions of small multiples
multiples_sizing.description: width and height of small multiples

inliers.title: Display of normal participants
inliers.description: toggles the display of participants with entirely normal results within each measure

visits_without_data.title: Display of visits without data
visits_without_data.description: toggles the display of visits with and without data

unscheduled_visits.title: Display of unscheduled visits
unscheduled_visits.description: toggles the display of unscheduled visits

unscheduled_visit_pattern.title: Unscheduled Visit Pattern
unscheduled_visit_pattern.description: a regular expression that identifies unscheduled visits

unscheduled_visits_values.title: Unscheduled Visit List
unscheduled_visits_values.description: an array of strings that identify unscheduled visits; overrides unscheduled_visit_pattern
